body:
MOCO'15

The second International Workshop on Movement and Computing (MOCO'15) was held at Simon Fraser University in Vancouver, BC, Canada on August 14-15, 2015. It was colocated with ISEA2015.

>> MOCO'15 Website

>> Online Proceedings (ACM Digital Library)

MOCO'14

The first International Workshop on Movement and Computing (MOCO'14) was held at Ircam in Paris, France on June 16-17, 2014.

>> MOCO'14 Website

>> Online Proceedings (ACM Digital Library)
